name: StartUpInBrazil
tag_list: legal-services, foreign-investor, brazil, company-formation, taxation, brazilian-taxation
overview:
We provide legal services to foreign investors wishing to establish a business in Brazil.

While we work with companies of all sizes, our focus is on small to medium size companies, which in many cases are investing abroad for the first time and require greater attention since they are often confronting novel situations for the first time.

We provide our legal services through a small boutique-type law firm, composed of experienced professionals with legal expertise in all aspects of business law. This ensures that the client gets the advice it needs in a timely fashion, which may not happen with large law firms where the smaller client may not possess the requisite leverage. We value the close personal relationships which results from our collaborative approach and consider the successful achievement of our clientsÂ´ goals as our principal objective.

Client work is always performed by specialist lawyers having the particular legal skills required for the matter at hand. However, the partner in charge of the clientÂ´s services will coordinate all client services and will serve as the principal communications link with the client.

The professionals in the firm have helped hundreds of foreign investors set up their businesses in Brazil, assisting them in incorporating companies and providing them with the necessary legal advice related to their intended activities. Where required, firm lawyers actively participate in acquisition and joint venture negotiations together with their clients.
